page.title: 06Farming
page.content: Berkeley farm is one of 4 farms owned by the Gosling family.The farm is situated just off the road called Mormead.The farm is 850 acres.It is 50% arable and 50% dairy.Sixteen workers work on the farm 8 work on the arable side 2 work on processing the milk and 6 work on delivering the milk.Altogether there is 190 cows.The farm does not get all of its milk from its own cows.Some of the milk it sells comes from other farms. The products sold include whole and skimmed milk,sterilized milk,eggs and fruit juice brought in from other farms. The farm bottles its own milk. Before the farm got its own dairy, the milk had to be sent to London. Berkeley Farm delivers milk to Swindon and Wroughton.
